name: The Time Traveler (Odaem)
description:
Made in 1 week for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2

In this game you can control the time of individual objects, including your self. Pause them in midair, or rewind their time to a previous state.

How To Play
  • WASD - move
  • Space - jump
  • Left mouse click - select game object
  • For selected object:
    • Right mouse click - pause time
    • Q - rewind time
    • E - forward time
Inspirations

Braid, obviously

Credits

This game was made by Ramadam
